title: Track Awesome Clojurescript Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Clojurescript (hantuzun/awesome-clojurescript) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A community driven list of ClojureScript frameworks, libraries and wrappers.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Jul 04, 2022
items.content_text:
### Resources / Books

*   [ClojureScript Unraveled (2nd edition)](https://funcool.github.io/clojurescript-unraveled/) – An open source book about the ClojureScript language that covers all the language features, how to use the compiler and the tooling for building applications and libraries.
items.content_html:
Resources / Books

  • ClojureScript Unraveled (2nd edition) – An open source book about the ClojureScript language that covers all the language features, how to use the compiler and the tooling for building applications and libraries.

*   [Clojure, The Essential Reference](https://www.manning.com/books/clojure-the-essential-reference) – A reference book on the Clojure language and standard library.
items.content_html:
Resources / Books

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 05, 2021
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / [React.js](https://facebook.github.io/react/) Interface

*   [Helix (⭐650)](https://github.com/lilactown/helix) – A simple, easy to use library for React development in ClojureScript with very few semantics on top of React.
*   [hx (⭐246)](https://github.com/Lokeh/hx) – Another simple, easy to use library for React development in ClojureScript.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / React.js Interface

  • Helix (⭐650) – A simple, easy to use library for React development in ClojureScript with very few semantics on top of React.
  • hx (⭐246) – Another simple, easy to use library for React development in ClojureScript.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Sep 24, 2019
items.content_text:
### Resources / Books

*   [ClojureScript Unraveled](https://leanpub.com/clojurescript-unraveled) – An open source book about the ClojureScript language that covers all the language features, how to use the compiler and the tooling for building applications and libraries.
*   [ClojureScript: Up and Running](https://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920025139.do) – An introduction to ClojureScript written by big guns of Clojure Stuart Sierra and Luke VanderHart.
*   [Etudes for ClojureScript](https://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920043584.do) – A hands-on-book of 30 companion exercises or études for introducing ClojureScript.
*   [Learning ClojureScript](https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/learning-clojurescript) – Master the art of agile single page web application development with ClojureScript.
*   [Transforming Data with ClojureScript](https://langintro.com/cljsbook) – A beginner's guide to ClojureScript with interactive examples and exercises, "focusing on the main task that programming does—transforming data".

### Resources / Courses

*   [ClojureScript Koans](http://clojurescriptkoans.com/) – A great way to start learning Clojure and ClojureScript on the web with interactive challanges.
*   [Lambda Island](https://lambdaisland.com/) – A full-stack web development course including front-end with ClojureScript, back-end with Clojure, language essentials, security, internet standards and system administration.
*   [Learn Reagent](https://www.learnreagent.com/) – An introduction to ClojureScript with Reagent for developers. 1 hour free content is available. [learn re-frame](https://www.learnreframe.com/) is its follow up.
*   [Learning ClojureScript](https://purelyfunctional.tv/) – A 2h 11m long introduction to Clojurescript by O'Really Online Learning. Also available on [Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/learning-clojurescript/).

### Resources / Videos

*   [ClojureScript for Skeptics](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gsffg5xxFQI) – Derek Slager's talk for Clojure Conj 2015 where he is Discussing the many reasons why ClojureScript is in fact a very pragmatic language to consider for web development.
*   [Interactive programming Flappy Bird in ClojureScript](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KZjFVdU8VLI) – A 5 minutes video from 2014 demostrating the power of ClojureScript's developer experience.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Code Analysis

*   [kibit (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/jonase/kibit) – Static code analyzer to find patterns of code that could be rewritten with a more idiomatic function or macro.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Development

*   [Ambly (⭐539)](https://github.com/omcljs/ambly) – A ClojureScript REPL into iOS JavaScriptCore.
*   [Instaparse (⭐89)](https://github.com/lbradstreet/instaparse-cljs) – It aims to be the simplest way to build parsers in ClojureScript.
*   [lein-cljsbuild (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/emezeske/lein-cljsbuild) – A Leiningen plugin to make ClojureScript development easy.
*   [shadow-cljs (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/thheller/shadow-cljs) – ClojureScript compilation made easy
*   [Truss (⭐322)](https://github.com/ptaoussanis/truss) – An opinionated assertions API for Clojure/ClojureScript.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

*   [Respo (⭐234)](https://github.com/mvc-works/respo) – A responsive DOM library, inspired by React.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Internationalization

*   [Tempura (⭐263)](https://github.com/ptaoussanis/tempura) – A Clojure(Script) i18n library, succeeding Tower

### Awesome ClojureScript / [React.js](https://facebook.github.io/react/) Interface

*   [cljsx (⭐14)](https://github.com/peterhudec/cljsx) – [JSX](https://reactjs.org/docs/introducing-jsx.html) for Clojure and ClojureScript, also works with [Inferno](https://infernojs.org), [Nerv](https://nerv.aotu.io/), [Preact](https://preactjs.com/), [Snabbdome (⭐12k)](https://github.com/snabbdom/snabbdom) and others.
*   [Om (⭐6.6k)](https://github.com/omcljs/om) – A powerful interface to React, makes use of its object oriented structures.
*   [Quiescent (⭐610)](https://github.com/levand/quiescent) – It favors functional style, fully stateless.
*   [Reagent](http://reagent-project.github.io/) – Minimalistic, feature complete.
*   [Rum (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/tonsky/rum) – Decomplected, extensible, simple.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Reactive Programming

*   [Manifold-cljs (⭐49)](https://github.com/dm3/manifold-cljs) – A port of [Manifold (⭐1k)](https://github.com/ztellman/manifold) to ClojureScript.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

*   [Fulcro](http://fulcrologic.github.io/fulcro) – A library for development of single-page full-stack web applications in clj/cljs.
*   [Mr-Clean](https://bitbucket.org/sonwh98/mr-clean) – A reagent compatible library without react.js dependency.
*   [Precept (⭐660)](https://github.com/CoNarrative/precept) – A declarative programming framework.
items.content_html:
Resources / Books

  • ClojureScript Unraveled – An open source book about the ClojureScript language that covers all the language features, how to use the compiler and the tooling for building applications and libraries.
  • ClojureScript: Up and Running – An introduction to ClojureScript written by big guns of Clojure Stuart Sierra and Luke VanderHart.
  • Etudes for ClojureScript – A hands-on-book of 30 companion exercises or études for introducing ClojureScript.
  • Learning ClojureScript – Master the art of agile single page web application development with ClojureScript.
  • Transforming Data with ClojureScript – A beginner's guide to ClojureScript with interactive examples and exercises, "focusing on the main task that programming does—transforming data".

Resources / Courses

  • ClojureScript Koans – A great way to start learning Clojure and ClojureScript on the web with interactive challanges.
  • Lambda Island – A full-stack web development course including front-end with ClojureScript, back-end with Clojure, language essentials, security, internet standards and system administration.
  • Learn Reagent – An introduction to ClojureScript with Reagent for developers. 1 hour free content is available. learn re-frame is its follow up.
  • Learning ClojureScript – A 2h 11m long introduction to Clojurescript by O'Really Online Learning. Also available on Udemy.

Resources / Videos

  • ClojureScript for Skeptics – Derek Slager's talk for Clojure Conj 2015 where he is Discussing the many reasons why ClojureScript is in fact a very pragmatic language to consider for web development.
  • Interactive programming Flappy Bird in ClojureScript – A 5 minutes video from 2014 demostrating the power of ClojureScript's developer experience.

Awesome ClojureScript / Code Analysis

  • kibit (⭐1.8k) – Static code analyzer to find patterns of code that could be rewritten with a more idiomatic function or macro.

Awesome ClojureScript / Development

  • Ambly (⭐539) – A ClojureScript REPL into iOS JavaScriptCore.
  • Instaparse (⭐89) – It aims to be the simplest way to build parsers in ClojureScript.
  • lein-cljsbuild (⭐1.1k) – A Leiningen plugin to make ClojureScript development easy.
  • shadow-cljs (⭐2.3k) – ClojureScript compilation made easy
  • Truss (⭐322) – An opinionated assertions API for Clojure/ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

  • Respo (⭐234) – A responsive DOM library, inspired by React.

Awesome ClojureScript / Internationalization

  • Tempura (⭐263) – A Clojure(Script) i18n library, succeeding Tower

Awesome ClojureScript / React.js Interface

  • cljsx (⭐14) – JSX for Clojure and ClojureScript, also works with Inferno, Nerv, Preact, Snabbdome (⭐12k) and others.
  • Om (⭐6.6k) – A powerful interface to React, makes use of its object oriented structures.
  • Quiescent (⭐610) – It favors functional style, fully stateless.
  • Reagent – Minimalistic, feature complete.
  • Rum (⭐1.8k) – Decomplected, extensible, simple.

Awesome ClojureScript / Reactive Programming

  • Manifold-cljs (⭐49) – A port of Manifold (⭐1k) to ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • Fulcro – A library for development of single-page full-stack web applications in clj/cljs.
  • Mr-Clean – A reagent compatible library without react.js dependency.
  • Precept (⭐660) – A declarative programming framework.

*   [cljs.test (⭐9.3k)](https://github.com/clojure/clojurescript/wiki/Testing) – Integrated test framework for ClojureScript (merged from [clojurescript.test (⭐164)](https://github.com/cemerick/clojurescript.test))

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Aug 25, 2018
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / Database

*   [specql (⭐131)](https://github.com/tatut/specql) – Library for simple PostgreSQL queries with namespaced keys.

### Awesome ClojureScript / CSS tools

*   [Garden (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/noprompt/garden) – A library for rendering CSS in Clojure and ClojureScript.
*   [stylefy (⭐319)](https://github.com/jarzka/stylefy) – stylefy makes it possible to define UI component styles as Clojure data and attach them into components easily without writing CSS selectors

### Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

*   [namespacefy (⭐21)](https://github.com/Jarzka/namespacefy) – A simple Clojure(Script) library which aims to make it easy to keep map keys namespaced, no matter where your data comes from.

### Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

*   [Tuck (⭐29)](https://github.com/tatut/tuck) – A micro framework for building Reagent apps that have a clean separation of view code and event processing code.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / Database

  • specql (⭐131) – Library for simple PostgreSQL queries with namespaced keys.

Awesome ClojureScript / CSS tools

  • Garden (⭐1.4k) – A library for rendering CSS in Clojure and ClojureScript.
  • stylefy (⭐319) – stylefy makes it possible to define UI component styles as Clojure data and attach them into components easily without writing CSS selectors

Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • namespacefy (⭐21) – A simple Clojure(Script) library which aims to make it easy to keep map keys namespaced, no matter where your data comes from.

Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

  • Tuck (⭐29) – A micro framework for building Reagent apps that have a clean separation of view code and event processing code.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Mar 20, 2017
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / Canvas

*   [Quamolit (⭐5)](https://github.com/Quamolit/quamolit) – A tiny declarative animation library , inspired by React.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Data Serialization

*   [Cljson (⭐62)](https://github.com/tailrecursion/cljson) – Clojure/ClojureScript library for accelerated browser data deserialization.
*   [Transit (⭐323)](https://github.com/cognitect/transit-cljs) – A data interchange format and set of libraries for conveying values between applications written in different programming languages.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Database

*   [Konserve (⭐304)](https://github.com/replikativ/konserve) – A clojuresque key-value/document store protocol with core.async.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Development

*   [cljs-devtools (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/binaryage/cljs-devtools) – Better presentation of ClojureScript values in Chrome Devtools.
*   [lein-figwheel (⭐2.9k)](https://github.com/bhauman/lein-figwheel) – Leiningen plugin that pushes ClojureScript code changes to the client.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

*   [Crate (⭐220)](https://github.com/ibdknox/crate) – A ClojureScript implementation of Hiccup.
*   [Dommy (⭐757)](https://github.com/plumatic/dommy) – A no-nonsense ClojureScript templating and DOM manipulation library.
*   [Kioo (⭐404)](https://github.com/ckirkendall/kioo) – DOM manipulation and templating library for Facebook's React and Om in ClojureScript.
*   [Sablono (⭐694)](https://github.com/r0man/sablono) – Lisp/Hiccup style templating for Facebook's React in ClojureScript.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Graphics

*   [geom (⭐970)](https://github.com/thi-ng/geom) – A 2D/3D geometry toolkit for Clojure/Clojurescript.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

*   [Keybind (⭐85)](https://github.com/piranha/keybind) – Library for handling key bindings (shortcuts) in browser.
*   [markdown-clj (⭐560)](https://github.com/yogthos/markdown-clj) – Markdown parser in Clojure/ClojureScript.
*   [reforms (⭐168)](https://github.com/bilus/reforms) – Beautiful Bootstrap 3 forms for Om and Reagent.
*   [Sepal.clj (⭐31)](https://github.com/Cirru/sepal.clj) – A library to generate Clojure code from a vector of strings and vectors with macro system.

### Awesome ClojureScript / [React.js](https://facebook.github.io/react/) Interface

*   [re-com (⭐815)](https://github.com/Day8/re-com) – A ClojureScript library of reusable components for Reagent.

### Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

*   [plato (⭐30)](https://github.com/eneroth/plato) – Incrementally persists atom state to Local Storage in ClojureScript.
*   [storage-atom (⭐192)](https://github.com/alandipert/storage-atom) – ClojureScript atoms backed by HTML5 web storage.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

*   [Chestnut (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/plexus/chestnut) – An Application template for ClojureScript/Om with live reloading.
*   [descjop (⭐394)](https://github.com/karad/lein_template_descjop) – A template for Web based desktop application with Electron.
*   [electron-template (⭐116)](https://github.com/ducky427/electron-template) – A template for creating web based desktop applications with Electron, ClojureScript and Reagent.
*   [WebFUI (⭐236)](https://github.com/drcode/webfui) – Client-Side Web Framework for ClojureScript.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / Canvas

  • Quamolit (⭐5) – A tiny declarative animation library , inspired by React.

Awesome ClojureScript / Data Serialization

  • Cljson (⭐62) – Clojure/ClojureScript library for accelerated browser data deserialization.
  • Transit (⭐323) – A data interchange format and set of libraries for conveying values between applications written in different programming languages.

Awesome ClojureScript / Database

  • Konserve (⭐304) – A clojuresque key-value/document store protocol with core.async.

Awesome ClojureScript / Development

  • cljs-devtools (⭐1.1k) – Better presentation of ClojureScript values in Chrome Devtools.
  • lein-figwheel (⭐2.9k) – Leiningen plugin that pushes ClojureScript code changes to the client.

Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

  • Crate (⭐220) – A ClojureScript implementation of Hiccup.
  • Dommy (⭐757) – A no-nonsense ClojureScript templating and DOM manipulation library.
  • Kioo (⭐404) – DOM manipulation and templating library for Facebook's React and Om in ClojureScript.
  • Sablono (⭐694) – Lisp/Hiccup style templating for Facebook's React in ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Graphics

  • geom (⭐970) – A 2D/3D geometry toolkit for Clojure/Clojurescript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • Keybind (⭐85) – Library for handling key bindings (shortcuts) in browser.
  • markdown-clj (⭐560) – Markdown parser in Clojure/ClojureScript.
  • reforms (⭐168) – Beautiful Bootstrap 3 forms for Om and Reagent.
  • Sepal.clj (⭐31) – A library to generate Clojure code from a vector of strings and vectors with macro system.

Awesome ClojureScript / React.js Interface

  • re-com (⭐815) – A ClojureScript library of reusable components for Reagent.

Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

  • plato (⭐30) – Incrementally persists atom state to Local Storage in ClojureScript.
  • storage-atom (⭐192) – ClojureScript atoms backed by HTML5 web storage.

Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • Chestnut (⭐1.3k) – An Application template for ClojureScript/Om with live reloading.
  • descjop (⭐394) – A template for Web based desktop application with Electron.
  • electron-template (⭐116) – A template for creating web based desktop applications with Electron, ClojureScript and Reagent.
  • WebFUI (⭐236) – Client-Side Web Framework for ClojureScript.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Mar 07, 2017
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / Development

*   [Devcards (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/bhauman/devcards) – Devcards aims to provide a visual REPL experience for ClojureScript.
*   [Planck (⭐1k)](https://github.com/mfikes/planck) – A stand-alone ClojureScript REPL for macOS and Linux based on JavaScriptCore.
*   [Ribol](http://docs.caudate.me/ribol/) – Conditional restarts for clojure/clojurescript.

### Awesome ClojureScript / WebSockets

*   [Chord (⭐439)](https://github.com/jarohen/chord) – Designed to bridge the gap between the triad of CLJ/CLJS, web-sockets and core.async.
*   [Sente (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/ptaoussanis/sente) – Clojure(Script) + core.async + WebSockets/Ajax.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / Development

  • Devcards (⭐1.5k) – Devcards aims to provide a visual REPL experience for ClojureScript.
  • Planck (⭐1k) – A stand-alone ClojureScript REPL for macOS and Linux based on JavaScriptCore.
  • Ribol – Conditional restarts for clojure/clojurescript.

Awesome ClojureScript / WebSockets

  • Chord (⭐439) – Designed to bridge the gap between the triad of CLJ/CLJS, web-sockets and core.async.
  • Sente (⭐1.8k) – Clojure(Script) + core.async + WebSockets/Ajax.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Dec 23, 2015
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

*   [Dominator (⭐73)](https://github.com/dubiousdavid/dominator) – Virtual-Dom in ClojureScript.
*   [Enfocus](http://ckirkendall.github.io/enfocus-site/) – A DOM manipulation and templating library for ClojureScript inspired by Enlive.
*   [Freactive (⭐386)](https://github.com/aaronc/freactive) – A high-performance, pure Clojurescript, declarative DOM library inspired by reagent, om, reflex and hiccup.
*   [json-html (⭐163)](https://github.com/yogthos/json-html) – Provide JSON and get a DOM node with a human representation of that JSON.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

  • Dominator (⭐73) – Virtual-Dom in ClojureScript.
  • Enfocus – A DOM manipulation and templating library for ClojureScript inspired by Enlive.
  • Freactive (⭐386) – A high-performance, pure Clojurescript, declarative DOM library inspired by reagent, om, reflex and hiccup.
  • json-html (⭐163) – Provide JSON and get a DOM node with a human representation of that JSON.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Nov 13, 2015
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / HTTP Handler

*   [Javelin (⭐811)](https://github.com/hoplon/javelin) – A Functional Reactive Programming library for ClojureScript.

### Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

*   [hodgepodge](http://funcool.github.io/hodgepodge/) – A idiomatic ClojureScript interface to HTML5 Storage.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Oct 07, 2015
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / Testing

*   [test.check (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/clojure/test.check) – A generative property-based testing tool inspired by QuickCheck.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 26, 2015
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / [React.js](https://facebook.github.io/react/) Interface

*   [Brutha (⭐139)](https://github.com/weavejester/brutha) – A simple and functional ClojureScript interface to React.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Reactive Programming

*   [Reagi (⭐230)](https://github.com/weavejester/reagi) – An FRP library for Clojure and ClojureScript, built on top of core.async.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / React.js Interface

  • Brutha (⭐139) – A simple and functional ClojureScript interface to React.

Awesome ClojureScript / Reactive Programming

  • Reagi (⭐230) – An FRP library for Clojure and ClojureScript, built on top of core.async.

*   [Entanglement (⭐43)](https://github.com/Frozenlock/entanglement) – It creates atoms from other atoms and links the data together.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

items.content_text:

*   [Yolk](https://github.com/Cicayda/yolk) – A thin ClojureScript wrapper around bacon.js.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / Reactive Programming

  • rx-cljs (⭐44) – A ClojureScript wrapper for Reactive Extensions (Rx) for Javascript.
  • Yolk – A thin ClojureScript wrapper around bacon.js.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 18, 2015
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / JavaScript Interoperability

*   [CLJSJS](http://cljsjs.github.io/) – An easy way for Clojurescript developers to depend on Javascript libraries.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

*   [Automat (⭐590)](https://github.com/ztellman/automat) – A Clojure(Script) library for defining and using finite-state automata, inspired by Ragel.
*   [core.async (⭐2k)](https://github.com/clojure/core.async/) – A Clojure(Script) library designed to provide facilities for async programming and communication.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / JavaScript Interoperability

  • CLJSJS – An easy way for Clojurescript developers to depend on Javascript libraries.

Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • Automat (⭐590) – A Clojure(Script) library for defining and using finite-state automata, inspired by Ragel.
  • core.async (⭐2k) – A Clojure(Script) library designed to provide facilities for async programming and communication.

items.content_text:

*   [Validateur](http://clojurevalidations.info/) – A Clojure validation library inspired by Ruby's ActiveModel.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / Validation

  • Validateur – A Clojure validation library inspired by Ruby's ActiveModel.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 03, 2015
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

*   [atw-om (⭐41)](https://github.com/zaiste/atw-om) – A web application template with Clojure/Compojure, ClojureScript/Om & core.async.
*   [Hoplon](http://hoplon.io) – Write everything in Clojure and ClojureScript, clientside and serverside.
*   [Luminus](http://www.luminusweb.net/) – It aims to provide a robust, scalable, and easy to use platform.
*   [re-frame (⭐5.5k)](https://github.com/Day8/re-frame) – A Reagent Framework For Writing SPAs, in Clojurescript.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • atw-om (⭐41) – A web application template with Clojure/Compojure, ClojureScript/Om & core.async.
  • Hoplon – Write everything in Clojure and ClojureScript, clientside and serverside.
  • Luminus – It aims to provide a robust, scalable, and easy to use platform.
  • re-frame (⭐5.5k) – A Reagent Framework For Writing SPAs, in Clojurescript.

items.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Apr 27, 2015
items.content_text:
### Awesome ClojureScript / Canvas

*   [Monet (⭐167)](https://github.com/rm-hull/monet) – A small ClojureScript library to make it easier to work with canvas and visuals.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Data Visualization

*   [C2](https://keminglabs.com/c2) – It lets you declaratively create HTML and SVG markup based on data.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Database

*   [Datascript (⭐5.6k)](https://github.com/tonsky/datascript) – An immutable in-memory database and Datalog query engine in ClojureScript.
*   [Jaki (⭐16)](https://github.com/pandeiro/jaki) – A simple ClojureScript CouchDB client.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

*   [cljs-binding (⭐57)](https://github.com/fluentsoftware/cljs-binding) – It binds html elements to ClojureScript functions.
*   [Hiccups (⭐215)](https://github.com/teropa/hiccups) – A ClojureScript port of the Hiccup.
*   [Hickory (⭐660)](https://github.com/davidsantiago/hickory) – It parses HTML into Clojure data structures, so you can analyze, transform, and output back to HTML.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Internationalization

*   [Tower (⭐278)](https://github.com/ptaoussanis/tower) – A Clojure(Script) i18n & L10n library.

### Awesome ClojureScript / JavaScript Interoperability

*   [Pylon (⭐54)](https://github.com/bodil/pylon) – A Javascript class system in 100% Clojurescript.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

*   [inflections-clj (⭐221)](https://github.com/r0man/inflections-clj) – Rails-like inflection library for Clojure and ClojureScript.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Routing

*   [Silk (⭐224)](https://github.com/DomKM/silk) – An isomorphic routing library for Clojure & ClojureScript.

### Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

*   [Waltz (⭐90)](https://github.com/ibdknox/waltz) – A ClojureScript library that helps manage state in client-side applications using non-deterministic finite state machines.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Testing

*   [Expectations](http://jayfields.com/expectations/) – A minimalist's unit testing framework.

### Awesome ClojureScript / Validation

*   [Bouncer (⭐364)](https://github.com/leonardoborges/bouncer) – A validation DSL for Clojure & Clojurescript applications.
items.content_html:
Awesome ClojureScript / Canvas

  • Monet (⭐167) – A small ClojureScript library to make it easier to work with canvas and visuals.

Awesome ClojureScript / Data Visualization

  • C2 – It lets you declaratively create HTML and SVG markup based on data.

Awesome ClojureScript / Database

  • Datascript (⭐5.6k) – An immutable in-memory database and Datalog query engine in ClojureScript.
  • Jaki (⭐16) – A simple ClojureScript CouchDB client.

Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

  • cljs-binding (⭐57) – It binds html elements to ClojureScript functions.
  • Hiccups (⭐215) – A ClojureScript port of the Hiccup.
  • Hickory (⭐660) – It parses HTML into Clojure data structures, so you can analyze, transform, and output back to HTML.

Awesome ClojureScript / Internationalization

  • Tower (⭐278) – A Clojure(Script) i18n & L10n library.

Awesome ClojureScript / JavaScript Interoperability

  • Pylon (⭐54) – A Javascript class system in 100% Clojurescript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • inflections-clj (⭐221) – Rails-like inflection library for Clojure and ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Routing

  • Silk (⭐224) – An isomorphic routing library for Clojure & ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

  • Waltz (⭐90) – A ClojureScript library that helps manage state in client-side applications using non-deterministic finite state machines.

Awesome ClojureScript / Testing

  • Expectations – A minimalist's unit testing framework.

Awesome ClojureScript / Validation

  • Bouncer (⭐364) – A validation DSL for Clojure & Clojurescript applications.
